title: :nth-of-type(n)
description: The `:nth-of-type(n)` CSS pseudo-class selects elements of a specific type based on their position among siblings.
content:
The pseudo-class that selects elements based on their position among siblings of the same type. It applies styles to elements that match the specified pattern, such as every second ('2n') `

` tag, allowing for precise control over elements of a certain type within their parent.
